c74object.name: mvc.brace.expansion
c74object.description: mvc.brace.expansion expand input strings to a series of output strings. It uses nodeJS with the brace package. It also outputs a destination address that allows mvc.brace.expansion to be used remotely and asynchronously, without getting confused. Brace expansions may be nested. The results of each expanded string are not sorted; left to right order is preserved.

inlet.description: The input string can contain special characters between curly braces, that will be interpreted by the brace expansion. Syntax is: - {some|words|or|others} wil create one instance per word between the '|' (pipe) - {1..12} wil create instances for all numbers between 1 and 12 - {3..13..3} will create instances for all numbers between 3 and 13, with a step of 3 (i.e. 3, 6, 9, 12 - {A,b,some,things} will create an instance for each string between commas (avoid spaces)
